info.title: WorkloadBuilder Client
info.description: Workload builder client provides access to workloads, migrationAgents, versions, artifacts, instances and it's status operations.

value.description: List of resources in current page.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

value.description: List of resources in current page.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

migrationApplianceId.description: Migration appliance ARM Id where the agent is running.

storageAccountId.description: Customer storage account arm Id where Queue and Table will be created.

storageQueueName.description: Queue to be used for handshake between migration agent and workload builder service.

storageTableName.description: Table to be used for storing information needed to generate spec for individual VMs.

applicationInsightsInstrumentationKey.description: Application insights instrumentation key to emit the agent logs.

agentLastHeartbeat.description: Agent last heartbeat time in UTC.
Agent last heartbeat time in UTC.

value.description: List of resources in current page.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

specContent.description: Version spec url or content. This field is empty on migration scenario.

keyVaultId.description:
Key-vault resource id.

Key-vault will be used to store secrets like private ssh keys or
passwords for the vms created in user's subscription.

VersionResourceMigrationPrerequisites.description: Prerequisites for version resource creation in migration scenario.

ArtifactResourcePageList.description: List of artifact resources page result.

value.description: List of artifact resources in current page.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

artifactContent.description:
Artifact definition content.
For example, if artifact type is 'Blueprint' then this field holds published blueprint Arm id.

artifactDependencies.description: List of artifacts the current artifact depends on.

value.description: List of resources in current page.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

versionId.description: Workload version Id for this instance.

targetResourceGroupId.description: Target resource group Id where workload infra resources will be created.

userManagedIdentity.description:
User managed identity id used for deploying the artifacts. This is optional field.
If provided, then it will be used for deployment operations. And this identity
should have necessary (owner) permissions on the subscription.

parameters.description: Parameters for individual artifacts of the version.

OperationActivityRecord.description:
Represents the activity record of an operation.

An activity represents a particular task or sub-task in an operation,
and this activity can recorded using below class.

subActivity.description:
Sub activity name.

This field is useful when an activity is again
split into multiple sub-activities.

data.description:
Activity data.

Activity data represents the details about activity/sub-activity performed.
Most of the time it could be simple message describing the activity.

level.description:
Activity record criticality level.

Indicates the criticality of the activity record. This can be assumed as log level.
0 - Critical, 1 - Error, 2 - Warning, 3 - info, 4 and above - verbose.

ParameterValue.description: Value type to store parameter values.

SecureValueType.description: Secure value type to store key-vault details.

ArtifactType.description: Type of supported workload artifact types.

ArtifactDeploymentState.description: Different states of the artifact deployment.

WorkloadType.description: Type of workloads understood by workload builder.

Resource.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource.

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager tracked top level resource

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

ErrorResponse.title: Error response
ErrorResponse.description: Common error response for all Azure Resource Manager APIs to return error details for failed operations. (This also follows the OData error response format.).

ErrorAdditionalInfo.description: The resource management error additional info.

Operation.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC).

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

OperationListResult.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
